line_1: Say, from your minds hath time eras'd
line_2: The pleasing images of glory pass'd?

line_1: The ancient pile by time eras'd,
line_2: Once many a sculptur'd trophy grac'd,
What his minute research has traced.

line_1: T' impress a value not to be eras'd
line_2: On moments squander'd else, and running all to waste.
